PHRASE.LANG: Developed and manufactured by the D2O Special Weapons Division. The D2O-MRX80 Stationary Mini-gun is a multi-barreled chain-gun that can fire .50 caliber shells at a rate of 5,000 shots per minute. [#Legal]
Développé et fabriqué par la division des Armes spéciales de la D2O. Le mini-canon D2O-MGX8 est un chaingun à plusieurs canons tirant plus de 5000 munitions de 5mm à la minute. [#Legal]

Developed and manufactured by the D2O Special Weapons Division. The D2O-MRX80 Stationary Mini-gun is a multi-barreled chain-gun that can fire .50 caliber shells at a rate of 5,000 shots per minute. [#Legal]
